lyric: 作词 : 项柳 Hsiang Liu
作曲 : 陈致逸 Yu-Peng Chen (HOYO-MiX)
Domina praeteritae peribitur et sculpitur crastino
translation: 过去已然消失，并铭刻于明天

lyric: Canonem gnosis inscribit inclinabimini non iam ad caelesti
translation: 灵魂的正典不再倾向于天堂

lyric: Ecce premeris quoniam iuvenis sanguinum es derelicte
translation: 看啊，你被折磨，因为你是被遗弃的骨血

lyric: A malo pressa voces iterum conquiratis quam manui sis tenere etiamsi (Nolite me relinquere ir in finem etiamsi)
translation: 啊，我寻求挣扎，会有人帮助我吗（不要抛弃我，即使到最后）

lyric: Qui formaret falsum deum (Vae cui formavit deum)
translation: 尽管谁会造出伪神？（尽管他将成为伪神）

lyric: Ad nihil utile
Poesis eis letis recto fatus tecum fallis deperdite
translation: 歌颂你的真实诗篇中尽是迷失与毁灭

lyric: Estris vae falsatis quod ad propinquavit
